text: Many states have publicly declared that they are waiving the work search requirement for those able to claim unemployment but I am unable to find information on whether NY is doing so as well. I was temporarily laid off due my work closing due to covid-19 and plan to come back to my workplace once it is open, which makes the work search requirement complicated. Does anyone have information or know of a official source that lets us know?
title: For those collecting unemployment benefits, is the work search requirement waived?
